code:
---
config:
  look: neo
  theme: default
---
classDiagram
    class ICategoryRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(entity)
        +findById(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(entity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    class PrismaCategoryRepository {
        +create(entity)
        +findById(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(entity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    PrismaCategoryRepository ..|> ICategoryRepository

    class IDashboardRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +getOrdersStats(params)
        +getRevenueStats(params)
    }
    class PrismaDashboardRepository {
        +getOrdersStats(params)
        +getRevenueStats(params)
    }
    PrismaDashboardRepository ..|> IDashboardRepository

    class IImageRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(image)
        +findById(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +delete(id)
    }
    class PrismaImageRepository {
        +create(image)
        +findById(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +delete(id)
    }
    PrismaImageRepository ..|> IImageRepository

    class IOrderRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(orderData)
        +findById(orderId)
        +findByCode(orderCode)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(orderId, updateData)
        +delete(orderId)
    }
    class PrismaOrderRepository {
        +create(orderData)
        +findById(orderId)
        +findByCode(orderCode)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(orderId, updateData)
        +delete(orderId)
    }
    PrismaOrderRepository ..|> IOrderRepository

    class IPaymentMethodRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +findById(id)
        +findAll()
        +create(paymentMethod)
        +update(paymentMethod)
        +delete(id)
    }
    class PrismaPaymentMethodRepository {
        +findById(id)
        +findAll()
        +create(paymentMethod)
        +update(paymentMethod)
        +delete(id)
    }
    PrismaPaymentMethodRepository ..|> IPaymentMethodRepository

    class IPaymentRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +createWithAttempt(paymentData, attemptData)
        +createAttempt(attemptData)
        +updateAttempt(attemptData)
        +createTransaction(transactionData)
        +update(updateData)
        +findById(paymentId)
        +findByOrderId(orderId)
        +findByAttemptId(attemptId)
        +findAll(query)
    }
    class PrismaPaymentRepository {
        +createWithAttempt(paymentData, attemptData)
        +createAttempt(attemptData)
        +updateAttempt(attemptData)
        +createTransaction(transactionData)
        +update(updateData)
        +findById(paymentId)
        +findByOrderId(orderId)
        +findByAttemptId(attemptId)
        +findAll(query)
    }
    PrismaPaymentRepository ..|> IPaymentRepository

    class IProductRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(product)
        +update(product)
        +delete(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +findById(id)
        +findAllOptions(query)
        +findOptionById(id)
        +updateBulkProductVariants(updates)
        +getBestSellers(query)
    }
    class PrismaProductRepository {
        +create(product)
        +update(product)
        +delete(id)
        +findAll(query)
        +findById(id)
        +findAllOptions(query)
        +findOptionById(id)
        +updateBulkProductVariants(updates)
        +getBestSellers(query)
    }
    PrismaProductRepository ..|> IProductRepository

    class IRoleRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(newEntity)
        +findById(id)
        +findByName(name)
        +findByType(type)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(updatedEntity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    class PrismaRoleRepository {
        +create(newEntity)
        +findById(id)
        +findByName(name)
        +findByType(type)
        +findAll(query)
        +update(updatedEntity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    PrismaRoleRepository ..|> IRoleRepository

    class IUserRepository {
        <<interface>>
        +create(newEntity)
        +findById(id, options)
        +findByEmail(email, options)
        +findAll(query, options)
        +update(updatedEntity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    class PrismaUserRepository {
        +create(newEntity)
        +findById(id, options)
        +findByEmail(email, options)
        +findAll(query, options)
        +update(updatedEntity)
        +delete(id)
    }
    PrismaUserRepository ..|> IUserRepository
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
